caption.title: Estimated proportion of global wheat-growing area affected by SWS between 1861 and 2100.
caption.p:
( A) Box plots of the proportions of the global WhA affected by SWS during the harvest year or in one of the two preceding seasons, based on observed data (
12 ) and GCM data (table S2) for two controls and three future time slices. ( B) Annual values of areas affected by SWS during the harvest year or two preceding seasons using CRU-based observed data (1911–2016) and control run data (i.e., 1860–2010) (
24 ) and GCM data for three RCP scenarios during the period 2011–2100.
